CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version = "1.0"?> <!-- ================================================================ $Id: CDR0000617324.xml,v 1.1 2008-10-10 17:14:31 venglisc Exp $
Filter to denormalize the MediaLink element. Since the MediaLink is an element in the GlossaryTermConcept document - which needs to be denormalized in the first step - we need to run this second step. Written by Volker Englisch, 2008-10-10
$Log: not supported by cvs2svn $ ================================================================ --> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version = "1.0" xmlns:cdr = "cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr">
<xsl:output method = "xml" omit-xml-declaration = "no"/>
<xsl:include href = "cdr:name:Module: Multimedia Denormalization"/> <!-- ================================================================= Copy control information and generate current date ================================================================= --> <xsl:template match = "GlossaryTermName"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<!-- ================================================================== Template rule used to do XML to XML transformations which copies any attribute node, or node that is child of of something ================================================================== --> <xsl:template match = "@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select = "@*|node()"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
